Summary: Bright light hovering craft then gone
trends: There have been no other sightings in Memphis, TN
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details 1. i was in my automobile driving into town on a country road. 2. a very bright blinding light 3. i thought it was a jet about to fall out of the sky. 4. the craft just switched off it's lights when i came to a stop in the road i had my i5phone so i jumped out and snapped a picture at that moment the very large craft just vanished from sight no sound at all. it was pointed s\w 5. my feelings were happy to have seen such a thing. 6. the craft just vanished it could have some sort of way of becoming invisible. i have attached a picture i hope it helps in whatever you are trying to accomplish. the way i see it is how in the world can you investigate something like this that can just leave in the blink of an eye. good luck
